Welcome to bob.thesis.ichingo2015's documentation!
===================================================

This package provides a userguide about how to run each step of the algorithms presented in my thesis titled: "Trustworthy Biometric Recognition Under Spoofing Attacks: Application to the Face Mode". 

Please use the User Guide below.

   :maxdepth: 2

   part2
   part3
   part4
